title: Topic 001 Question 153
body: A SysOps administrator is attempting to download patches from the internet into an instance in a private subnet. An internet gateway exists for the VPC, and a NAT gateway has been deployed on the public subnet; however, the instance has no internet connectivity. The resources deployed into the private subnet must be inaccessible directly from the public internet.
What should be added to the private subnet’s route table in order to address this issue, given the information provided?
